page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: {A Typical Day in a Primary School.} On Thursday after breakfast I walked to school. First of all we had Assembly. We had prayers, poems, Bible readings and a hymn. Our first lesson was mathematics. We did fractions. At playtime we had fun on the grass. I learned how to do a handstand into crab position. Next was physical education. I enjoyed doing a forward roll in the air and landing on the crash mat. For the rest of the morning our teacher read us a story called "The Silver Sword". It was exciting. In the afternoon we did comprehension and punctuation exercises. School finished at 3.20 p.m. I went to rounders practice before going home. In the evening I went to Brownies, which is a group of girls who meet in uniform.
